item.title: Kindred by Octavia E. Butler
item.description: About the book Author: Butler, Octavia E. (1947-2006) Title: Kindred. Publication: Boston : Beacon Press, 2003. ISBN 9781449876814. DAISY audio format narrated by Kim Staunton. CELA library call number DA46431. 306 pages in the paperback edition; 10 hrs., 55 min. as a recorded book. About the story This is the story of Dana, a young African-American woman living in California in 1976, who is mysteriously and uncontrollably called to Maryland, circa 1815, to save the life of a white slave-owner.
